name: AVCaptionSettingsKey
desc: A structure that defines dictionary keys to configure the caption converter and validator.

items.name: static let mediaType: AVCaptionSettingsKey
items.desc: A key that identifies the output media type of a caption conversion operation.

items.name: static let mediaSubType: AVCaptionSettingsKey
items.desc: A key that identifies the output media subtype of a caption conversion operation.

items.name: static let timeCodeFrameDuration: AVCaptionSettingsKey
items.desc: A key that identifies the frame duration that the system uses for the time code.

items.name: static let useDropFrameTimeCode: AVCaptionSettingsKey
items.desc: A key that identifies whether the system uses drop frame time code.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a settings key with a string.
